author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LSC Announces Engagement With Haitong International Capital For Review Of Strategic Alternatives In Asia
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Lsc Lithium Corp:
* LSC ANNOUNCES ENGAGEMENT WITH HAITONG INTERNATIONAL CAPITAL FOR REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES IN ASIA
* LSC ANNOUNCES ENGAGEMENT WITH HAITONG INTERNATIONAL CAPITAL FOR REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES IN ASIA
* LSC-ENGAGED UNIT OF HAITONG INTERNATIONAL AS NON-EXCLUSIVE FINANCIAL ADVISOR TO FOCUS ON SOURCING POTENTIAL ASIA-BASED INVESTORS â€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
